title.rendered: MLB Player Prop Parlay for Friday, June 30TH

content.rendered:
Mason Folz, for example, loves to hammer MLB Player Props when he can’t decide on a total or a side. He dives deep into the stats and finds the best possible matchups for the day! Here is Mason’s Three-Team Parlay Prop Parlay!

This week is all about matchups. I want to find teams that have continued to strike out consistently this season. Now, I have found three separate areas that I would like to attack, as I EXPECT to cash in BIG today! It doesn’t matter if you think a team is going to win or lose, you just have to find one perfect spot. Luckily, I have done that for everyone today! It’s never going to be easy, but once you find success with these props, you won’t look back! Hop on this MLB 3-Leg Player Prop Parlay, and you won’t regret it!

How to Make Player Props Work for You!

Dean Kremer Over 5.5 Strikeouts (-150)

I will be riding with the Orioles starting pitcher today, as I believe he has a great matchup. He will be facing the Twins, who are averaging the 30th least amount of K’s per game. 10.29 strikeouts per game to be exact, as I see him starting this game hot and pitching deep enough into this game to push this strikeout total over the number. Kremer has also recorded at least five strikeouts in seven straight games. He will continue to attack in this one and record more than (5.5) strikeouts. 

Jose Berrios Over 4.5 Strikeouts (-160)  

I also really like Jose Berrios matchup in this game, as the Red Sox have struggled against RHP in their last five games. In that stretch, they are only hitting .221 vs. RHP and striking out 8.2 times per game. Berrios has been a beast at home as of late and I expect him to show up in this game. He is currently (8-5), but he is (4-1) at home and his ERA drops to 2.48. He has also recorded at least five strikeouts in six of his last eight starts. He’s been playing great and I see him staying hot in this game.

Pick Jose Berrios to record Over (4.5) strikeouts. 

Bet $5 Get $200 Instantly + Up to $150 in No Sweat Bets

Grab the Offer Now!
Disclaimer
Gambling problem? Call (877-8-HOPENY) or text HOPENY (467369). If you or someone you know has a gambling problem, crisis counseling and referral services can be accessed by calling 1-800-GAMBLER (1-800-426-2537) (IL/IN/LA/MI/MD/NJ/OH/PA/TN/WV/WY), 1-800-NEXT STEP (AZ), 1-800-522-4700 (CO/KS), 888-789-777/visit ccpg.org (CT), 1-800-BETS OFF (IA), or 1-88-532-3500 (VA).

Carlos Carrasco Over 4.5 Strikeouts (-130)

I will be taking the over (4.5) strikeouts in this one, as I believe Carlos has a solid matchup in this one. San Francisco is striking out the 28th least amount of times per game and Carrasco has recorded at least five of his last six starts. He hasn’t pitched particularly deep into games, but I think he has a chance to show up at home in this game. The Giants have also been better against LHP, as they are only hitting .241 as a team in their last 10 games against a RHP. They will struggle at different points in this one and Carrasco will record just enough Ks to push this total over the number (4.5). 

Parlay Odds: +379 

Betting on player props in any sport is a tough task. It takes a lot of research and you always have to know who is hot! But, Mason has taken care of that for you today, as he is ready to start your holiday weekend with a BANG! He has kept his head in the books and he KNOWS that these three players have 5 STAR matchups today! They have all been dealing and he doesn’t expect them to slow down before the All-Star break! So, ride with Mr. Folz and his MLB Player Prop Palray today and develop your passion for betting on props!
